content:
There are several notable conferences on AI in healthcare happening in the next few months. Here are some of the top ones:

1. **AI in Healthcare Summit** (Virtual, February 23-24, 2023)
This online conference brings together healthcare professionals, researchers, and industry experts to discuss the latest advancements and applications of AI in healthcare.
2. **HIMSS Global Health Conference & Exhibition** (Chicago, IL, April 17-21, 2023)
While not exclusively focused on AI, HIMSS is one of the largest healthcare conferences in the world, and AI in healthcare will be a significant topic of discussion.
3. **AI Med 2023** (San Francisco, CA, April 24-26, 2023)
This conference focuses on the application of AI and machine learning in medicine, with speakers from top institutions like Stanford and UCSF.
4. **World Medical Innovation Forum: AI in Medicine** (Boston, MA, May 1-3, 2023)
This forum, hosted by Partners HealthCare, will feature experts from academia, industry, and government discussing the latest developments and future directions of AI in medicine.
5. **AI in Healthcare: From Research to Real-World Applications** (London, UK, May 10-11, 2023)
This conference, organized by the Royal College of Physicians, will explore the practical applications of AI in healthcare, including clinical decision support, imaging, and patient outcomes.
6. **MLHC 2023: Machine Learning for Healthcare** (New York City, NY, June 1-3, 2023)
This conference, co-organized by MIT and Cornell Tech, focuses on the machine learning aspects of AI in healthcare, with a strong emphasis on technical research and innovation.
7. **AI Summit at BIO 2023** (Boston, MA, June 5-8, 2023)
The AI Summit is part of the Biotechnology Innovation Organization (BIO) International Convention, which will feature sessions on AI applications in drug development, diagnostics, and personalized medicine.

These conferences are just a few examples of the many events happening in the next few months. Be sure to check the dates, locations, and agendas to find the ones that best fit your interests and schedule.
